General.Name: Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic products in Thailand. It offers drinking straws, zipper and slider bags, general bags, cling wraps, zip profiles, and body scrubs; and compostable products comprising paper and bio straws, bio zipper bags, shopping bags, gloves, cutlery and agricultural films, and bio garbage bags on roll. The company sells its products under the SUN PRODUCTS, Kitchen Neat, Fresh & Fresh, Zip Solution, SUNBIO, and SUNMUM brands. It also exports its products to Europe, Australia, New Zealand, the United States, Asia, and Africa. The company was formerly known as Blowtech (Thailand) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited in 1994. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Sam Phran, Thailand. Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Sunflower Company Limited.
